819320.name: Secret World Legends: Dawn of the Morninglight Collector’s Edition
819320.description:
For the intrepid globetrotter, the Dawn of the Morninglight Collector's Edition features an exclusive pet, cosmetics, and a Special Agent to command through the Agent Network!

Collector's Edition Includes:
  • Witch Doctor's Outfit (Male and Female)
  • Scarlet Kongamato pet
  • Mask of Death's Wisdom
  • Special Agent Dossier

Purchase not necessary to access new story content. Your character must be at least Level 15 and able to access the Agent Network to use the Agent Dossier.

*NOTE: Dawn of the Morninglight Collector’s Editions purchased through Steam only apply to Steam Users of Secret World Legends
819320.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
